rules.name: DeptVal
PhoneVal
branchVal
maintVal
R1- MaintenanceRule -Show Closure Details when user is member Clayton_Laverton
R2 - Request Status update table when Status is NOT Draft and user is ADMIN
R3 -Hide Request Status update table When Status is Draft - ELSE show and Enable Custom btns
R4- Lock - Request Details - When Not DRAFT - and not Admin or Harry

identifier.raw: not(contains([SharePoint Columns].[Workflow Status],"Draft")) && not([Context].[Current user email]=="O365SPOAdmin@wadams.com.au") && not(toLower([Context].[Current user email]) == "harryludorf@wadams.com.au")

rules.name: R5 - if its Not Draft - Disable or Hide SAVE and SUBMIT buttons
R6 - Show - Hide Status when empty or Draft StatusRule1
R7 - CancelledColorRule - Status is RED when "Cancelled"
R8- CompletedColorRule -Status is GREEN when "Completed"
R9 - DefaultColor - Status is Orange for other
R10 -Show - Print view btn when Not in NEW mode - HideInNewMode
R11-Hide - When WF Status is Draft Hide Maintain Closure group hideinDraft
R12 - Hide the Urgent Maintenance  text label when in "DISPLAY" mode hideinviewmode
Show - the Group Print View Panel when ticked - prntclick check box
hideinprntmode
R13- PRINT PREVIEW - clicked -Hide Form and Show Print View grp hideinprntmode
Set - Request Date - currentDate - and Current User
Show - Hide Action Panel and header menu when prnbtn is ticked
Hide - or Show Riskware Incident Number

formula.raw:
ifElse(![Form].[b_Status is Draft] && 
( 
   ([Context].[Current user email]=="O365SPOAdmin@wadams.com.au") ||
   (toLower([Context].[Current user email]) == "harryludorf@wadams.com.au")
),
true,
false)

properties.name: lbl_txt_Urgent Request
properties.title: lbl_txt_Urgent Request
properties.text:
NOTE: For any URGENT Maintenance requests please contact the Maintenance Hotline numbers below and then submit the details below to verify the request.

Clayton : 9566 0656

Laverton : 0419 963 345
